They all have one, in part, because the folks at WordPress make it easy to have one. But to actually build a good blogÃ¢â‚¬â€to create a blog people want to readÃ¢â‚¬â€takes thought, planning, and some effort. From picking a theme and using tags to choosing widgets and building a community, creating your blog really starts after youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve set it up.

In Building a WordPress Blog People Want to Read by blogger extraordinaire Scott McNulty, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll learn how to:
Install and get your WordPress site running.
Set up your site to ensure it can easily grow with you and your readers.

Find a theme and make it your own.
